element.name: Psionic Awakening
element.prerequisite: ???, You do not have the Psionics feature.

p.i: ???, You do not have the Psionics feature

description.p: You have learnt to manifest your will with a thought.

ul.li: You learn one psionic talent and one psionic discipline from the mystic's class, and you are capable of focusing on that discipline.
You gain 4 psi points to spend on psionic disciplines, and have a psi limit of 2. You regain all spent psi points when you finish a long rest.
Your psionic ability modifier is Intelligence.
